params.loanId: - A unique identifier for this particular loan, sourced from the Loan Coordinator.
params.nftCollateralContract: - The ERC721 contract of the NFT collateral
params.nftCollateralId: - The ID within the AirdropReceiver for the NFT being used as collateral for this loan.

params.loanId: - A unique identifier for this particular loan, sourced from the Loan Coordinator.
params.nftCollateralContract: - The contract of the NFT collateral
params.nftCollateralId: - The ID within the AirdropReceiver for the NFT being used as collateral for this loan.
params.receiverId: - id of the created AirdropReceiver, takes the place of nftCollateralId on the loan

AirdropPulledFlashloan(uint256,address,u.notice: This event is fired whenever a flashloan is initiated to pull an airdrop

CollateralWrapped(uint256,address,uint25.notice: This event is fired whenever the collateral gets wrapped in an airdrop receiver
